column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rodney - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen. In the past six months
column2: the City of Houston Public Works Department has been tearing up Louisiana and Milam Streets to upgrade the sewage system. As a result
column3: foul-smelling air drifts into our establishment. Until these works are completed
column4: there's little we can do to remedy the situation
